Plot: Rithy Panh uses clay figures, archival footage, and his narration to recreate the atrocities Cambodia's Khmer Rouge committed between 1975 and 1979.
Title: The Missing Picture
tomatoConsensus: Thrillingly unorthodox and emotionally searing without being didactic, The Missing Picture is a uniquely poignant documentary -- and so much more.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 8 wins & 13 nominations.
